synonyms.synonym: Sodium channel protein brain III subunit alpha
Sodium channel protein type III subunit alpha
Voltage-gated sodium channel subunit alpha Nav1.3

protein.specific_function: Mediates the voltage-dependent sodium ion permeability of excitable membranes. Assuming opened or closed conformations in response to the voltage difference across the membrane, the protein forms a sodium-selective channel through which Na(+) ions may pass in accordance with their electrochemical gradient
